original_title: 妻が旅行で不在中 義妹と夢中でハメまくった72時間30分 本庄鈴
overview: My sister-in-law kissed me while my wife was standing in the kitchen during dinner ... My wife went on a trip without knowing why. Her sister-in-law was supposed to be back soon, but I may have wanted to see what the kiss last night meant. At first, it was probably a light glue. But like lovers, we forgot about her wife's existence and overlapped over and over again.
title: While My Wife Was Away On Vacation, I Went Crazy With My Little Sister-In-Law And Fucked The Shit Out Of Her For 72 Hours And 30 Minutes Suzu Honjo
